snippet: Reigning champion Andy Murray will spearhead Britain's challenge for tennis medals at the Rio Olympics after being named alongside his brother Jamie in a four-player squad on Friday....
lead_paragraph: Reigning champion Andy Murray will spearhead Britain's challenge for tennis medals at the Rio Olympics after being named alongside his brother Jamie in a four-player squad on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Murray Brothers to Spearhead Britain's Olympic Medal Hunt
headline.main: Murray Brothers to Spearhead Britain's Olympic Medal Hunt
